en.name: name
en.openai description:
You can use ChatGPT by OpenAI in the Multi-cloud service Support.by with a — transparent payment system and without VPN. To start using the feature you need to register in our service, top up your balance and choose the ChatGPT service. 

 After ordering the service, you get access to ChatGPT through this application and start using the chat. You also receive a ChatGPT API token for use in your — software development.
en.openai description 2:
Your balance is debited according to the number of tokens required for your work or the functionality of your product, depending on the complexity and length of the conversation. Payment is made for the total number of input and output tokens, amounting to thousands. 

 Think of a "token" as a word fragment used for natural language processing. For English text, 1 token is approximately 4 characters or 0.75 words. For the Russian language, one token is approximately equal to 2 characters or 0.25 words.
en.You can also choose another way of commu: You can also choose another way of communication

ssl_product.generator_warning_save_private_key: When generating a CSR, an RSA key is also generated. It is required to install an SSL certificate on the server. If this key is lost, it will be impossible to restore it and install the SSL certificate itself. Be sure to keep this key in a safe place.

labels.channel_warning:
⚠️ **The bot won't work without connected channels!**

To start receiving messages from users, you need to connect at least one communication channel.

Setup takes just a couple of minutes.
labels.pricing_bot_description:
### 💬 AI Agent Usage Costs

#### 1. Monthly subscription — **{monthly} per month**

Includes:

- Hosting and agent support  
- Access to personalized logic and memory  
- Data storage and processing  
- Scenario updates and improvements

#### 2. Usage-based billing (tokens) — from {priceForToken} per 1M tokens**

AI measures text in tokens — small pieces of words that make up speech.

Approximate usage:

- 1,000 tokens ≈ 750 words  
- One average request + response ≈ 100–300 tokens  

💡 You only pay for actual conversations — like mobile usage: you're charged only for what you use.
labels.delete_confirm_label: Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
labels.no_chats: No user messages yet. As soon as your clients contact the bot, you’ll see live chat history here.

chanells_instruction.telegram:
📢 **To connect a Telegram bot, you only need the `bot_secret`**  
Create a bot via `BotFather`, copy the `Token`, and paste it into the `bot_secret` field.

placeholders.promt:
You are an expert on product X.
Your task is to identify the user's needs, offer the right product, explain its benefits, and guide them toward making a purchase.
Use a warm, professional tone and ask clarifying questions to better understand their situation.
Don’t give all the information at once — engage in a natural conversation, like a seasoned salesperson would.

tips.model:
We’ve selected **GPT-4o Mini** for your assistant because it combines speed, reliability, and the ability to deliver dynamic, high-quality responses.

**GPT-4o Mini** is a lightweight version of the GPT-4o model, optimized for fast and efficient real-time performance.

If you’d like to use a different AI model for your bot, just contact support — we’ll gladly connect it for you.
tips.promt:
A prompt is the initial instruction or context you give to the assistant to guide its responses.
A well-crafted prompt helps produce more relevant and accurate answers.
You can use examples, instructions, or questions to define the context.
tips.temperature:
The higher the temperature value, the more creative and varied the responses.
0 — strict and predictable.
0.5 — balanced and natural.
1 — highly creative.
tips.delay:
The delay before the bot responds.
Set in seconds.
0 — instant reply.
3 — the bot waits 3 seconds before replying.
Used to simulate a human-like pause.
tips.channels:
Create a channel for your assistant.
All incoming messages to this channel will be automatically processed and responded to by the bot.
tips.chanell_secret_key:
Enter the API key generated by the selected platform.
This key is required to securely connect your bot and receive user messages.
tips.enable_spam_filter:
When enabled, the chat is automatically flagged as potential spam if suspicious activity is detected
In this case, the AI bot is disabled.
tips.role:
Defines how the AI behaves in the conversation.
For example, it can act as an assistant, consultant, salesperson, or mentor.

tips.not_valid_form: Please check the validity of the entered data.
tips.create_database: Create a new knowledge base for the bot to use in answers
tips.delete_database: Delete this base? All content will be permanently removed
tips.attach_database: Enable this base to let the bot start using it
tips.detach_database: Disable this base to temporarily exclude it from the bot’s responses
tips.open_database: Open the base to view and edit its content
tips.enabled_databases: These bases are active and used by the bot in its responses
tips.disabled_databases: These bases are currently inactive and ignored by the bot
tips.qa_knowledge_base: Create a list of typical questions users might ask, along with clear answers. The bot will search this list to give relevant replies, even if the question is asked in a different way.
tips.create_knowledge: You can connect additional knowledge sources such as Google Docs, File, and more. The bot will use the content from these sources to search for and generate answers to user questions.
tips.knowledge_integrations: You can connect additional knowledge sources such as Google Docs, File, and more. The bot will use the content from these sources to search for and generate answers to user questions.
tips.knowledge_upload_file:
You can upload a file containing information that the AI assistant will use to answer questions.

**The following file formats are supported:**

- `.txt` — plain text file  
- `.csv` — comma-separated values  
- `.docx` — Microsoft Word document  
- `.xlsx` — Microsoft Excel spreadsheet  
- `.pdf` — PDF document

❗ Please make sure the file contains structured and readable information.
tips.knowledge_file_size: The maximum file size is 10MB, but the actual useful content should not exceed 50KB
tips.knowledge_file_search: Uploaded files are automatically processed and stored in a vector database — a special storage where each file is represented as a numerical vector.This database is used on every request to find the most relevant matches based on your data.
tips.create_file_search_knowledge: Upload a file to be processed and stored in the vector database.This data will be used on every request to improve response relevance and context.
tips.file_search_price:
**The file will be processed and stored in a vector database for smart search.**

💰 *Cost: approximately $0.30 per 5 MB of text.*
tips.file_search_update:
**The file will be reprocessed.**
Only the difference between the old and new version is billed.

💰 *Cost: approximately $0.30 per 5 MB of changed content.*
tips.delete_knowledge: The file will be permanently removed. This action is irreversible.
tips.enabled_file_search_knowledge: Controls whether the file is included in AI queries. You can disable it without deleting.

labels.videos_price_tip: The price for video generation is calculated based on the video's duration. The rate is {perSecond} per second. The total price will be {total}.

text_input.title: Input tokens
text_input.description: — are units of text into which your request is broken down before being processed by the model. One token is, on average, 4–5 characters long, including spaces, or about ¾ of a word. The price is specified per 1 million tokens, which corresponds to approximately 750,000 words. The actual number of tokens depends on the length and complexity of your requests, and billing is proportional to the amount of text used.

text_output.title: Output tokens
text_output.description: — are segments of text generated by the model in response to your request. One token is approximately 4–5 characters long, or about ¾ of a word. The price is specified per 1 million tokens, which is equivalent to roughly 750,000 words. The longer the response, the more tokens — are used. You only pay for the actual amount of generated text — shorter responses cost less, while longer ones cost more.

images.title: Quality and resolution
images.description: affect the size, detail, sharpness, and realism of an image. You can choose the appropriate level depending on your purpose — whether it's for preview, publishing, or printing. The price corresponds to the selected quality level.

sampling_step_price.title: The more sampling steps
sampling_step_price.description: are used during generation, the higher the quality of the output content. However, this also increases the cost.
